abstract: When we design learning environments that incorporate new technologies, we need to consider many issues. One of these is human computer interaction (HCI). HCI has evolving into an interdisciplinary field that includes computer science, learning science, psychology, graphic design and media design, as well as several others. Devising effective HCI in highly immersive and participatory environments is the future work of learning technologists and instructional designers.
meta: December 2019Issues and Trends in Educational Technology 7(2)
